summary: Live Demo Analytics Hull-style Risk Engine testing complete. All features verified: Demo Analytics tab loads with purple/orange theme, Strategy Allocation horizontal bar chart with Allocated/Equity/P&L toggle, Portfolio Risk Profile radar chart (5 metrics), Risk Profile Interpretation panel with LOW CONFIDENCE warning, Risk Limits tab with NEW badge, Active Risk Policy (1%, 3%, 25%, 200:1), Position Sizing Calculator with correct MaxLotsAllowed calculation, XAUUSD Example showing correct calculations ($10 stop = 1.00 lot, $5 stop = 2.00 lots), Strategy Risk Analysis dropdown showing 5 demo accounts.
critical_code_review_comments: Live Demo Analytics correctly implements all Hull-style Risk Engine features from Trading Analytics
Purple/orange theme (#A855F7, #F97316) properly distinguishes demo accounts from live trading
Position Sizing Calculator correctly uses MaxLotsAllowed = min(MaxLotsRisk, MaxLotsMargin) formula
Strategy Allocation chart shows demo accounts: CRYPTO, JOEL, UNO14, GOLD with toggle functionality
Risk Profile Interpretation shows LOW CONFIDENCE warning when no trades recorded
seed_data_creation: None - using existing demo accounts from MongoDB
context_for_next_testing_agent: Live Demo Analytics Hull-style Risk Engine features verified. Navigation: Admin Dashboard -> Demo Analytics tab -> Portfolio Overview / Risk Limits tabs. Key features: Strategy Allocation horizontal bar chart (replaces pie chart), Risk Profile Interpretation panel, Risk Limits tab with Position Sizing Calculator. Demo accounts in Strategy Risk Analysis: GOLD DAY TRADING (#2210), JOEL ALVES NASDAQ (#2215), CRYPTO BITCOIN (#20062), JOEL ALVES GOLD (#2216), UNO14 (#2217).
